name: Ghostborn

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in Faction Crypts by 65

skills.name: Energy Bolt
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +20%

skills.name: Petrify
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK] [SPD]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Ancestral Spirits
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Dark Elves
faction.default_description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 37 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Fallen from grace in their homelands of Aravia, the Dark Elves inhabit the forests that border the realms of Teleria. They see persecutions in Kaerok rather as a boon than a bane supplying them with a stream of silver. They have set up tolls for those anxious to pass safely, but woe betide those who cannot pay.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Ghostborn is a legendary assist champion from the faction Dark Elves doing spirit damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Dark Elves, Ghostborn is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Assist type
structured_data.name: Ghostborn

default_description: Ghostborn is a legendary assist champion from the faction Dark Elves doing spirit damage
